reviewText: This beautiful woman, Valrie Donzelli, wrote this movie and starred in it.  She tried to sell it to movie makers but no one was interested.  So, somehow, she put together the company to make the film.  Her husband in real life is costar (Jrmie Elkaim).  There are no special effects.  This a simple story about the struggles of two parents when their child has a bad diagnosis.  I thought it was a fine film.
